arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher calls on Tottenham chairman Daniel Levy to be REPLACED - and insists 'someone else needs to be in charge of this football club' as pressure mounts on Ange Postecoglou after Spurs' 4-3 defeat by Chelsea
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher has called on Tottenham to make a change in the club's hierarchy by replacing chairman Daniel Levy (left) after Sunday's 4-2 humbling against rivals Chelsea.

arts.ttl: How Spurs' mistakes cost them the Chelsea match
arts.sum: Match of the Day 2 pundits Ashley Williams and Troy Deeney discuss the individual Tottenham Hotspur mistakes that resulted in Chelsea coming from two goals down to win 4-3.

arts.ttl: FA investigating after objects thrown at Chelsea star Cole Palmer during Tottenham clash
arts.sum: Tottenham supporters threw paper at Chelsea players, including Cole Palmer, during the first half of their 4-3 defeat on Sunday - and the FA are now investigating the incidents

arts.ttl: Romeo Lavia injury update: Enzo Maresca on Chelsea midfielder's substitution against Tottenham Hotspur in Premier League win
arts.sum: Romeo Lavia's withdrawal against Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday afternoon was precautionary, with Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca describing his injury as minor.

arts.ttl: How Rangers can save Ange as Chris Sutton tells Tottenham fans what's coming
arts.sum: Sutton reminded Spurs fans they are still getting exactly what they demanded when former Celtic boss first arrived

arts.ttl: Postecoglou: Spurs squad still believe in my ideas
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has said the Tottenham squad still support his attacking philosophy and backed them to turn their season around after losing 4-2 to Chelsea on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Spurs players 'very happy' with Postecoglou - Romero
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur defender Cristian Romero says manager Ange Postecoglou still has the backing of the players after the club's frustrating 4-3 loss to Chelsea.

arts.ttl: Tottenham’s comedy of errors leaves questions over Ange Postecoglou’s future
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur 3-4 Chelsea: Cole Palmer scored two penalties as the Blues completed a comeback from two goals down at their London rivals

arts.ttl: Cole Palmer breaks huge Premier League record with Panenka penalty against Tottenham
arts.sum: Cole Palmer surpassed another Premier League landmark in Chelsea's 4-3 victory over Tottenham.

arts.ttl: Spurs' dispirited loss to Chelsea is a microcosm of the Ange era
arts.sum: Spurs started so incredibly brightly against Chelsea on Sunday, only for it to all fall apart -- as things have tended to do under Ange Postecoglou.
